    • addArc

      public void addArc​(java.lang.String pNode1, java.lang.String pNode2, java.lang.String pDirection, int pFrequency)
      addArc adds an arc object Even though we could make the direction one way or the other. In this method, we always will calculate the direction to be node1 -> node2
      Parameters:
      pNode1 -
      pNode2 -
